member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties
member.summary: Specifies the image descriptor metadata properties for Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) frames.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorLeft
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Indicates the X offset at which to locate this frame within the logical screen.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorTop
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Indicates the Y offset at which to locate this frame within the logical screen.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorWidth
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Indicates width of this frame, in pixels.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorHeight
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Indicates height of this frame, in pixels.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorLocalColorTableFlag
member.summary: [VT_BOOL] Indicates the local color table flag. TRUE if global color table is present; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorInterlaceFlag
member.summary: [VT_BOOL] Indicates the interlace flag. TRUE if image is interlaced; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: WICGifImageDescriptorProperties.WICGifImageDescriptorSortFlag
member.summary: [VT_BOOL] Indicates the sorted color table flag. TRUE if the color table is sorted from most frequently to least frequently used color; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: [VT_UI1] Indicates the value used to calculate the number of bytes contained in the global color table.
To calculate the actual size of the color table, raise 2 to the value of the field + 1.
